title: Revenue: Adding a Deposit
body:
Revenue: Adding a Deposit¶

The Maha Platform keeps a record of all payments that have been made by customers into a bank account associated with the organization.
To add a new deposit, follow the steps below.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Finance

  3. Click Revenue

  4. Click Deposits

  5. Click on a deposit to view the deposit details, an audit trail, and comments

  6. Click Transactions to view the payments included in the deposit

    • Click a hyperlinked payment method to view the associated payment

  7. To add a new deposit, click

    • Select a date

    • Select bank account

    • Select transaction(s). Mass select by clicking select all

    • Click Save
